com.mschwartz.dateslider.timeview

Interface TimeView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DayWeekdayLayoutView, MonthDayWeekdayLayoutView, TimeTextView, TwoItemsLayoutView

    public interface TimeView
    This interface represents the views that will be placed in the ScrollLayout. Each TimeView represents a visible element in the ScrollLayout, and is displayed as a single point in time (e.g. January), but actually represents a range of times (e.g. 1/1-1/31). The TimeView stores the range as well as a string describing how to display itself.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimeObject getTimeObject() 
      void setTime(TimeObject to)
      Sets this TimeView to display the contents of the specified TimeObject.
